verses.roman:
nārada kahe,--"ihā āmi kichu nāhi cāhi
āra eka-dāna āmi māgi tomā-ṭhāñi

synonyms: nārada kahe—Nārada Muni said; ihā—this; āmi kichu nāhi cāhi—I don't want any; āra—another; eka-dāna—one charity; āmi—I; māgi—beg; tomā-ṭhāñi—from you.
translation: "Nārada Muni said, 'I do not want any of the skins. I am only asking one thing from you in charity.
